display.title: Distillation Tower
description: A multiblock machine that is used to crack oil into components.
Distillation tower requires 3x3x4 multi-block with hallow in the center.
First layer is made of 9xBasic Machine Casing.
Second layer is made of 8xIndustrial Machine Casing.
Third layer is made of 8xBasic Machine Casing.
Top Layer is made of 9xIndustrial Machine Casing.
Attach machine to the bottom center block and power it.

subtitle.text: A multiblock machine that is used to crack oil into components.
